sentences.sContent: He tried to pass for a gentleman;but everyone knew he was an upstart.
sentences.sContent_eng: He tried to pass for a gentleman;but everyone knew he was an upstart.
sentences.sCn: 他设法将自己冒充成为一名绅士，但每个人都知道他只是一位暴发户。

synos.tran: [经]暴发户；自命不凡的人；傲慢自负的人

remMethod.val: up(向上) + start(开始) → 开始向上 → 暴发户
